Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Toronto in 2015...
Injured on 4/8/2015 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 7/22/2017 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Earned first career win on 5/13/2020...
Had first career hit on 5/30/2020, off Victor Eskew (WSH)...
Traded from Toronto to Arizona on 6/26/2022 (Going to TOR: P J. Shaute Jr., P M. Harder Jr., 2B D. DeShields Jr, P I. Nobuhiko. Going to ARI: P D. Navarro)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/4/2023, off Allen Sothoron Jr. (NYM)...
Won Cy Young Award in 2023, going 23-12, 4.18 ERA...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
